import { isLabelWithInternallyDisabledControl } from "@testing-library/user-event/dist/utils"; import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; // let xx = localStorage.getItem("lo") // JSON.parse(xx) function Detail(){ const [getdata, setData] = useState([]); const param = useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:8080/laravel8/laravel8/public/api/blog/detail/" + param.id) .then(res =>{ setData(res.data.data) }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error) }) },[]) const [item, setItem] = useState({ message:"" }); // let config ={ // headers: { // 'Authorization': 'Bearer '+ accessToken, // 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded', // 'Accept': 'application/json' // } // } let checkLogin = localStorage.getItem("local") JSON.parse(checkLogin) if(checkLogin != ""){ const formData = new FormData(); formData.append('id_blog',getdata.id); formData.append('id_user', ) } const [err,setErr] = useState([]); let errObj = {} function handleIP(e){ let getName= e.target.name let getValue = e.target.value setItem(state => ({...state,[getName]:getValue})) } function handleSubmit(){ let x =1; let xx = localStorage.getItem("local"); JSON.parse(xx) if(xx == null){ errObj.Comment = "vui long dang nhap" x=2; } if(item.message == ""){ errObj.message = "vui long nhap binh luan" x=2; } setErr(errObj) if(x==1){ alert("ok") } } function showErr(){ if(Object.keys(err).length > 0){ return Object.keys(err).map((key,index)=>{ return(
  • {err[key]}
    • ) }) } } function showComment(){ if(Object.keys(item).length > 0){ return Object.keys(item).map((key,index)=>{ return(
  • {item[key]}
